summary: This document is a U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) automated notification email indicating that a user accessed a lookout query record for Jeffrey Epstein on July 6, 2019, at Newark Liberty International Airport. It shows law enforcement monitoring of Epstein's travel status shortly before his arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whose lookout record (P3N06596100A01) was accessed by a user at Newark International Airport on July 6, 2019.

events.title: CBP Lookup of Epstein Record at Newark Airport
events.description: A U.S. Customs and Border Protection user accessed a Person Lookout Query record for Jeffrey Epstein at Newark Liberty International Airport, Terminal C.

locations: NEWARK, INTL AP TERMINAL C (Newark Liberty International Airport, Terminal C, New Jersey, USA)
keyFacts: On July 6, 2019, a law enforcement user accessed a CBP Person Lookout Query record for Jeffrey Epstein (record P3N06596100A01).
The access occurred at Newark Liberty International Airport, Terminal C, indicating monitoring of Epstein's travel status or potential movements.
The query was made just days before Epstein's arrest on July 6-8, 2019, suggesting active pre-arrest surveillance or intelligence gathering.
